statements: SELECT * FROM bioenergy_production_systems ORDER BY system_id ASC;
SELECT system_name, location FROM bioenergy_production_systems WHERE production_capacity > 1000;
SELECT system_name, production_capacity FROM bioenergy_production_systems WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT system_name, production_capacity FROM bioenergy_production_systems ORDER BY production_capacity DESC;
SELECT system_name, location, production_capacity FROM bioenergy_production_systems ORDER BY system_name ASC;
SELECT system_name, location, production_capacity FROM bioenergy_production_systems ORDER BY production_capacity DESC, system_name ASC
SELECT system_name, location FROM bioenergy_production_systems WHERE production_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT * FROM bioenergy_production_systems ORDER BY system_id
SELECT system_name, production_capacity FROM bioenergy_production_systems WHERE location = 'USA' ORDER BY system_name
SELECT system_name, location, production_capacity FROM bioenergy_production_systems WHERE production_capacity < 500 ORDER BY production_capacity
SELECT id, system_name, production_capacity, production_location FROM biofuel_production_systems;
SELECT system_name, production_capacity, production_location, id FROM biofuel_production_systems;
SELECT production_location, system_name, id, production_capacity FROM biofuel_production_systems;
SELECT system_id, production_date, efficiency FROM production_metrics;
SELECT efficiency, production_date, system_id FROM production_metrics;
SELECT * FROM biofuel_production_systems
SELECT system_name, production_capacity FROM biofuel_production_systems ORDER BY production_capacity DESC
SELECT system_name, production_location FROM biofuel_production_systems WHERE production_capacity > 10000
SELECT system_name, SUM(production_capacity) AS total_capacity FROM biofuel_production_systems GROUP BY system_name
SELECT ps.system_name, pm.production_date, pm.efficiency FROM biofuel_production_systems ps INNER JOIN production_metrics pm ON ps.id = pm.system_id
SELECT * FROM Bioenergy_Plants;
SELECT plant_name, production_capacity FROM Bioenergy_Plants;
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, production_capacity FROM Bioenergy_Plants ORDER BY plant_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Bioenergy_Resources WHERE resource_type = 'Biomass';
SELECT production_id, plant_name, production_date, production_amount FROM Bioenergy_Plants JOIN Bioenergy_Production ON Bioenergy_Plants.plant_id = Bioenergy_Production.plant_id;
SELECT * FROM Bioenergy_Plants;
SELECT plant_id, plant_name FROM Bioenergy_Plants ORDER BY plant_name DESC;
SELECT plant_name, production_capacity FROM Bioenergy_Plants WHERE production_capacity > 1000;

SELECT p.plant_name, r.resource_name, pr.production_date FROM Bioenergy_Plants p JOIN Bioenergy_Production pr ON p.plant_id = pr.plant_id JOIN Bioenergy_Resources r ON pr.resource_id = r.resource_id ORDER BY pr.production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Bioenergy_Production WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM bioenergy_production_data;
SELECT production_date, biofuel_type FROM bioenergy_production_data ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT production_id, production_quantity FROM bioenergy_production_data WHERE biofuel_type='Biodiesel';
SELECT facility_name, facility_location FROM production_facility WHERE facility_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY facility_name;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM process_log ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM bioenergy_production_data ORDER BY production_date DESC, production_quantity ASC;
SELECT biofuel_type, SUM(production_quantity) as total_production FROM bioenergy_production_data GROUP BY biofuel_type;
SELECT biofuel_type, production_quantity FROM bioenergy_production_data WHERE production_quantity > 1000;
SELECT facility_name, facility_location, SUM(facility_capacity) as total_capacity FROM production_facility GROUP BY facility_name, facility_location;

SELECT p.production_id, p.production_date, l.log_timestamp, l.log_message FROM bioenergy_production_data p JOIN process_log l ON p.production_id = l.production_id ORDER BY p.production_date DESC, l.log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Bioenergy_Production;
SELECT production_id, production_location FROM Bioenergy_Production WHERE production_capacity > 1000;
SELECT production_date, production_capacity FROM Bioenergy_Production ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT staff_name, staff_role FROM Bioenergy_Staff WHERE staff_salary > 50000;
SELECT report_id, report_author, report_date FROM Bioenergy_Reports WHERE report_description LIKE '%renewable%';
SELECT * FROM Bioenergy_Production WHERE production_location = 'USA' ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT production_location, production_capacity FROM Bioenergy_Production WHERE production_capacity > 1000;
SELECT staff_name, staff_role FROM Bioenergy_Staff WHERE staff_salary > 50000 ORDER BY staff_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Bioenergy_Reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_capacity FROM Bioenergy_Equipment WHERE equipment_type IN ('Generator', 'Boiler') ORDER BY equipment_capacity DESC;
